title: CollectionBuilder-GH
description: Build a digital collection totally online using GitHub and GitHub Pages for all configurations and object storage.
points: Classroom Projects;Serverless Omeka;Small Collections; Learning about Git, Static Web Technologies, web development and design

title: CollectionBuilder-SA
description: Build a Stand Alone, totally self-contained digital collection with search, viz and browsing features enabled.
points: Self-contained collections or Small Digital Libraries;Jumping Ship from Proprietary Systems and Bloated Contracts;Taking Complete Control of Your Metadata, Objects, and Design

title: CollectionBuilder-Skin
description: Build a Skin to place on your current system. We currently offer a ContentDM skin. A skin for Murkurtu will be developed this year.
points: Bringing the Most out of your current Digital Collections;Creating New Thematic Collections and Exhibits;Incorporating Non-Developers into the Building and Design Process
